questions.question: I hate to get ....................... early in the morning.

questions.description: To get by is to manage financially to survive on little money

questions.description: When something gets you down, it depresses you.

questions.question: How could you get .................................. cheating on the test?
He got ........................... his bike and rode down the road.

questions.description: To get on is to have a relationship with someone.

questions.question: I wonder what he is getting .......................
